Constructor Detail

Notification

public Notification(int notificationID,
                    int senderID,
                    int recipientID,
                    boolean viewed,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String type)
Constructor that creates a Notification with all required parameters. viewed boolean must be false to have it pop-up on a user's screen.

Notification

public Notification(int notificationID,
                    int senderID,
                    int recipientID,
                    java.sql.Timestamp time,
                    boolean viewed,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String type)
Constructor with required parameters as well as a Timestamp attribute that determines when message was sent. If you want a notification to appear in the future, this constructor should be used.

Parameters:
notificationID - id of this notification. Should be auto-set by database so any value can be used
senderID - id of employee who is sending notification
recipientID - id of employee who is receiving notification
time - time that notification should be seen as sent.
viewed - boolean if the notification has been viewed
message - String message of the notification
type - String type of notification

Notification

public Notification(int notificationID)
Constructor that is meant for easy deletions of notifications.

Parameters:
notificationID -
